data.title: Ava Thurston - Skiing

data.text:
2x All-America Second Team (2023 20K Classic; 2023 5K Freestyle)

All-East First Team (2023)

USCSA National Collegiate All-Academic Ski Team (2023)

2x EISA Women’s Nordic Skier of the Week (Feb. 13, 2023; March 1, 2023)

SOPHOMORE (2024)

Finished twelfth in the 20K Classic and earned a top 20 finish in the 7.5k freestyle at the NCAA Championship ... Won the 20k women's classic mass start at the EISA Championship ... Placed on the podium in the 7.5k freestyle at the Colby Carnival and the classic sprint at the Vermont Carnival.

FIRST-YEAR (2023)

Finished in the top 10 at the NCAA Skiing Championships in both the freestyle and classic races to earn All-America Second Team honors in both events … raced in four EISA carnivals, reaching the podium in seven of her eight races while placing fifth in the other … won her last three classic races leading into the NCAA Championships … best freestyle finish came at Williams, taking second in the 5K … named the EISA Female Nordic Skier of the Week twice, after Harvard (Feb. 13) and the EISA Championships (March 1) … also the DartmouthSports.com Female Athlete of the Week following NCAAs … took gold at the U.S. Cross Country Ski Championships in the junior women’s 10K classic and skied at the FIS World Junior and U23 Championships as well.

BEFORE DARTMOUTH

Attended Harwood Union from 2018-2022 ... won the individual D2 state titles in cross country, and Nordic freestyle and classic every year of her high school career … cross country team won the team title in three of her four years as well … made the Vermont all state teams for Nordic in 2019-2022, cross country in 2018-2021 and lacrosse in 2022 … captained the cross country team her final two years.
